descriptionHtml:
Chaos Fang Scythe 


Yes, I know you begin to get bored with scythes but I can\'t stop myself from doing this kind of stuff.
So yes, another scythe and sickle from the game Darksiders 2.
This time, I decided to do the Legendary Chaos Fang.
In the DS2 game, you can only got these if you have a finished Darsiders 1 save game on your drive, so for people not being so lucky
I decided to model one for this wonderful game that Skyrim is.

As always there are two models, one handed and two handed waraxe and battleaxe, both being a little above Daedric stats, but the damage depends on your level when you forge them.
Craftable, upgradable, enchantable.

These are pretty high poly models.Between 6000/7000 polys.
The textures are 2048 px.


Installation: 

NMM ready or drop everything from the archive into your data folder and activate the Esp in the launcher.

Uninstalation: 

Use NMM or remove what you installed manually.


-Credits:

Bethesda for Skyrim
Vigil Game and THQ for Darksiders II (R.I.P.)

Please, do not upload this on any other site than Skyrim Nexus.
If you want to modify these files, PM me first.

Have fun..

AthenaX
author: AthenaX
